Lab 4 Introduction

The objectives of this lab are to:

  • Review how to read input with the Scanner class, which is part of the java.util package.
  • Practice problem-solving with conditional logic.
  • Introduce the Eclipse debugger for tracing and visualizing execution of your code.

As a first step, make a new project named project4 in your coms227 workspace, and within it create four packages:

  • lab4.
  • postage1.
  • postage2.
  • postage3.
Download the following files and put them in the lab4 package:

CeilingTest.java
PostageTest.java
PostageTestFormatted.java
